actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to require the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to conduct research on mass violence.
short_title: Expanding Research on Mass Violence Prevention Act

summary.text:
Expanding Research on Mass Violence Prevention Act

This bill directs the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to engage in specified research and activities to improve surveillance, risk assessment, and prevention strategies related to mass violence.

titles.title: A bill to require the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to conduct research on mass violence.
Expanding Research on Mass Violence Prevention Act
